oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Gerald Gimre, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Nashville Housing Authority Executive Director Gerald Gimre, c.1950s. In addition to his role as NHA Executive Director, Gimre also served as president of the Tennessee Association of Housing Authorities. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gimre, Gerald, 1897-1991
Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);

Nashville (Tenn.);
